summary: The bill, the Radiation Oncology Case Rate Value Based Program Act of 2025, proposes amending Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a value-based payment program for radiation oncology services. This program aims to create stable payments, improve access to care, enhance quality, and contain costs. It outlines per-episode payments, adjustments, and reporting requirements, as well as an add-on payment to address transportation insecurity for patients. It also includes exemptions from budget neutrality adjustments and revises civil monetary penalties related to patient transportation services.
